value="一个mysql的镜像<br>挂载到名为mysql-storage的volume<br>路径为： /var/lib/mysql" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="150" y="485" width="300" height="75" as="geometry" value="<font style="font-size: 16px;">对底层volume的抽象</font>" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1180" y="510" width="220" height="220" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YY_hCdos26KapYSeuus7-16" value="<font style="font-size: 16px;">PV1</font>" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1810" y="557.5" width="240" height="155" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YY_hCdos26KapYSeuus7-22" value="我要这样子的PV<br>1. storageClassName：suibianxie<br>2. storage为1G<br>3. AccessMode是ReadWriteOnce" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="820" y="620" width="240" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YY_hCdos26KapYSeuus7-23" value="" style="shape=flexArrow;endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1" target="YY_hCdos26KapYSeuus7-16"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="1020" y="690" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="1175.4455142306833" y="740.8187258061848" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="YY_hCdos26KapYSeuus7-24" value="K8S会去匹配对应的PV" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="900" y="770" width="200" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div:
一个mysql的镜像
挂载到名为mysql-storage的volume
路径为： /var/lib/mysql

1. storageClassName：suibianxie
2. storage为1G
3. AccessMode是ReadWriteOnce
